name: Rage Within Rage
description:
You play as the Rage Player, as you shoot down endless Demon Minions. One touch from them, and you're DEAD! But use that rage, because the more you die, the stronger you'll get!

Endless, mindless fun until you die for real (at 21 deaths)!

Controls:

-Arrow keys (Or WASD) to move

-Mouse to aim, click to shoot

-Esc/P to pause

Made for the Weekly Game Jam (Week 130 - Theme: "Dying is Awarded")

https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-130

All assets were made by me, DomedVortex!

Follow my Twitter for more stuff! https://twitter.com/DomedVortex
